resources.string:
This experimental software is provided without warranty of any kind, so you use it completely at your own risk!
Remote controlling an Insight insulin delivery pump with this software will only work if you have paired it with your phone.
You must consult your doctor before making any medical decision or action based on this or with this software. Always follow the instructions provided by your equipment manufacturer and medical professionals.
This is open-source software provided free of charge. Before using the software you are free to inspect the code for bugs. The source code is available at: https://github.com/TebbeUbben/SightRemote.
This application will never send any collected data anywhere by default. Everything remains in your phone/tablet for maximum privacy protection.
There is an interface for third party applications. Applications need your approval before they are able to use it. Consider that these applications might send collected data elsewhere, so check with their respective privacy policies for more details.
By accepting this end user license agreement you agree you are legally able to do so and are willing to accept all responsibility for what could happen and that you understand there are no guarantees that using this application is safe or beneficial or that it will be compatible with your device.
If you are 18 years old and agree to these terms then please indicate below:
First your pump must be paired with this device. Put your device into pairing mode to do that. Settings -> Communication -> Add device.
Congratulations, you successfully paired your pump with this device!
The pairing was declined on the pump.
You must accept the terms first.
Are you sure you want to deliver %1$sU?
Are you sure you want to deliver %1$sU? in %2$02d:%3$02d hours?
Are you sure you want to deliver %1$sU? immediately and %2$sU in %3$02d:%4$02d hours?
Are you sure you want to run your basal rate at %1$d%% for %2$02d:%3$02d hours?
Are you sure you want to stop your pump?
Are you sure you want to start your pump?
